column4: The package adobe-flashplugin needs to be reinstalled, but I can't find an archive for it. Where can i put it so that apt-get could find it?
You defo need this http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1315380 I had same error
The reply from mac9416 fixes it.
Yes. thats exactly what I was looking for. Thanks
NP, I was pulling my hair out over it :)
